summary: Adds a drug effect to Skooma (multilingual [DE, EN])
descriptionHtml:
Also available at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9872]Steam Workshop[/url]

This mod is multilingual [DE, EN].
The Mod is compatible with any version of Skyrim, inclusive Dawnguard.
Please endorse this mod if you like it.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]

[color=green][b][u]Main Files:[/u][/b][/color]
1.1
Adds 3rd person drinking animation.
1.0
Adds a drug effect to:
[list][*]Balmora Blue[*]Double-Distilled Skooma[*]Kordir's Skooma[*]Skooma[/list]
[color=green][b][u]Optional Files:[/u][/b][/color]
"Skooma Drug Effects 1st person"
[list][*]effect only in 1st person view.[*]changed "Sleeping Tree Sap" effect also to only 1st person.[/list]
"Skooma Cooking"
[list][*]Skooma craftable on Cookpot.[/list]

[color=yellow][b]Bugs:[/b][/color]
None so far, please report if you find some.

[color=yellow][b]Install:[/b][/color]
Copy the "data" folder from the archive to your Skyrim directory.
If asked to overwrite, say yes.
Start the Skyrim launcher, go to "Data Files" and make sure the files are activated.

[color=yellow][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color]
Delete the skoomaeffect.esp (and/or skoomacooking.esp) from your "...\Skyrim\data" directory.

[color=yellow][b]Note:[/b][/color]
Perhaps not compatible with other mods that change the Skooma effect on something.

And take a look at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9733]Alcohol Drunk Effect[/url]
author: johnwayne1930

files.name: Skooma Drug Effect 1st person
files.changelogHtml:
added optional download for effects only in 1st person view
added optional download for cooking Skooma
